summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account balance and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's personal checking account. It outlines the beginning and ending balances, as well as any deposits and withdrawals made during the specified period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for Jeffrey Epstein's personal checking account.
The beginning balance as of November 1, 2013, was $10,099.94.
There were no checks paid or significant withdrawals during the statement period.
The ending balance as of November 30, 2013, remained at $10,099.94.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or questions regarding the account.
